title: I'm having issues after the 3/2021 update. Assistant is wonky and things keep.crashing
content:
I keep having issues with after the update last week. Assistant won't launch apps or dial contacts. Actual google apps crash and at one point Android stopped according to a warning message. 

I've cleared a few caches and some storage. Any other suggestions?
category: Homescreen and Launcher, Google Pixel 4 XL
